titleStmt.title: The VVelch-mans warning-piece. As it was delivered in a sermon in Shropshire at the assembly when the resolution was agreed upon. And now pnblished [sic] for the cood of all her countrymen in these parts. By Shon ap Morgan. In the anti-prelatian yeer. 1642. Wherein her gives Kot thanks, that her was no beshit.
titleStmt.author: Morgan, Shon ap.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Wood, and Henry Marsh,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
